alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Holmes; North Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 10:37PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Walton, southwestern Holmes and north central Washington Counties through 1015 PM CST... At 937 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near De Funiak Springs, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Union, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Westville, Leonia, Douglass Crossroad, Alpine Heights, Cerrogordo, Prosperity, Gritney, Arrant Settlement, De Funiak Spring Airport, Pleasant Hill, Pleasant Ridge, Center Ridge, Hulaw, New Home and Hickory Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Holmes; North Walton; Washington
